fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.scoreboard.sender

Class ObjectiveSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.scoreboard.sender.ObjectiveSender

  • public class ObjectiveSender
extends Object
    This class uses packets to send the SidebarObjectives to their receivers.

    WARNING

    This class is intended for use with the sidebar objectives only. Notably, it will force the display position and unregister the objectives previously sent through it. This API may evolve to a generic way to send scoreboard packets, but it's not currently the case.

    Author:
    Amaury Carrade

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObjectiveSender() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clear(UUID player)
      Tells the given player to destroy the previously sent objective, if it exists.
      static void clearForAll()
      Sends destroy packets for the displayed sidebar to any still logged in player.
      static void handleLogin(UUID id)
      Invalidates the stored connection of a player, and removes the last objective sent, because if the used logged out and now log back in, the client removed by itself the previously-sent objective.
      static void send(SidebarObjective objective)
      Sends the given objective to its receiver(s).
      static void updateDisplayName(SidebarObjective objective)
      Updates the display name of the given objective.
      static void updateLine(SidebarObjective objective, String oldLine, String newLine, int score)
      Sends, for each receiver of this objective, the packets needed to replace the old line (with the given score) with the new line (with the same score).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObjectiveSender

        public ObjectiveSender()

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public static void send(SidebarObjective objective)
        Sends the given objective to its receiver(s).
        Parameters:
        objective - The objective to be displayed.

      • updateDisplayName

        public static void updateDisplayName(SidebarObjective objective)
        Updates the display name of the given objective.

        For each receiver, this will send a display name update packet if the objective is already displayed, or send the whole sidebar, if not.

        Parameters:
        objective - The objective to update.

      • updateLine

        public static void updateLine(SidebarObjective objective,
                              String oldLine,
                              String newLine,
                              int score)
        Sends, for each receiver of this objective, the packets needed to replace the old line (with the given score) with the new line (with the same score).
        Parameters:
        objective - The objective the old line (and the new) belongs to.
        oldLine - The replaced line.
        newLine - The new line.

      • clear

        public static void clear(UUID player)
        Tells the given player to destroy the previously sent objective, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        player - The UUID of the player to clear.

      • clearForAll

        public static void clearForAll()
        Sends destroy packets for the displayed sidebar to any still logged in player.

      • handleLogin

        public static void handleLogin(UUID id)
        Invalidates the stored connection of a player, and removes the last objective sent, because if the used logged out and now log back in, the client removed by itself the previously-sent objective.
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID of the invalidated connection.
